function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Fomite transmission of human pathogenic viruses on surfaces","Impact":"Increase in the potential for disease spread in commercial, healthcare, and residential environments","Mitigation":"Regular surface disinfection and the use of self-disinfecting surfaces","Technologies":"Self-disinfecting surface coatings, such as SurfaceWise2","People":"Occupants and visitors of commercial, healthcare, and residential environments","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and manufacturers of self-disinfecting technologies"},{"Description":"Recontamination of surfaces after disinfection","Impact":"Potential for the spread of infectious viruses due to recontamination","Mitigation":"Use of self-disinfecting surfaces that can continuously inactivate deposited pathogens","Technologies":"Self-disinfecting surface coatings, such as SurfaceWise2","People":"Occupants and visitors of commercial, healthcare, and residential environments","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and manufacturers of self-disinfecting technologies"},{"Description":"Efficacy of technology against specific viruses, such as coronavirus","Impact":"Risk of inadequate protection against specific viral pathogens","Mitigation":"Continuous testing and validation of the efficacy of self-disinfecting surface technologies against specific viruses","Technologies":"SurfaceWise2, continuous antimicrobial coatings","People":"Occupants and visitors of commercial, healthcare, and residential environments","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, and manufacturers of self-disinfecting technologies"}]}
